sections.general: guest teacher professional overview a detail - oriented, high energy social science teacher with the ability to motivate students to work at optimum levels while maintaining a comfortable, creative environment, and keeping a clear perspective of goals to be accomplished. experience in helping students broaden perspectives through aligning subject matter to present day experience and events. core qualifications creative lesson planning differentiated learning excellent relationship building skills positive and encouraging experiential learning able to work independently and as a member of a team interpersonal, oral, and written communication skills curriculum lesson plan development accomplishments secondary 7-12 social studies. issued: 11/17/15.
